titles.title: For the relief of Eugene Hasenfus.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 2/8/1995--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum in full satisfaction of all claims of a named individual with respect to any physical, mental, or financial injury arising from a missile attack on an airplane in which he was a crewmember, or from his subsequent detention in Nicaragua.
